Major Version Bump._readme: will update the 'patch' section of the semantic version (x.0.0)

Minor Version Bump._readme: will update the 'patch' section of the semantic version (0.x.0)

Patch Version Bump._readme: will update the 'patch' section of the semantic version (0.0.x)

Preview Version Bump._readme: will update the 'preview' section of the semantic version (0.0.0-preview.x)

Manual._readme: useful for setting a preview for an upcoming version. Will ask for a prompt of the new version string

Download Icon._readme: downloads a png to a specific location to then be used by nuget packages as a built in icon
